autoContrast.name: Auto-Contrast
autoContrast.hint: Automatically generate accessible text colors that meet WCAG AA standards for trait chips and UI elements

highContrast.name: High Contrast Mode
highContrast.hint: Enable high contrast mode for better visibility

reducedMotion.name: Reduced Motion
reducedMotion.hint: Respect your system's reduced motion preference to minimize animations

contrastLevel.name: Contrast Level
contrastLevel.hint: Choose WCAG compliance level for color contrast (AA for normal use, AAA for high accessibility needs)

accessibilitySettings.name: Accessibility Settings
accessibilitySettings.label: Configure Accessibility
accessibilitySettings.hint: Configure accessibility features for better usability
